data.message: Atm in this world trump supporters is what is wrong with America!!!!!  You think you stating to him that you won't buy another album will sadden him !  I think he made himself clear that it won't.  This country is very much divided and it's not because Eminem drew a line in the sand , trump drew that line day one! Fuck trump and his supporters , you all disgust me!

replies.message: Well I mean come on, I don't even have to get into politics when it comes to trump.... he is morally wrong person , and President or anyone with power like that in our country is supposed to have a certain moral code. They are supposed to want good for everyone in our country not just some and he does not. His supporters are people who we have noticed will support him no matter what comes out of his mouth, and if they support a racist asshole who thinks he can do whatever he wants to women .
I don't even need to watch that ^^^ I don't care if he does support him now, I still don't support him or think any better of trump
